success.subject: Done -- %s
success.body:
Dear User,
The results of your submitted job are available now at https://search.mmseqs.com/queue/%s .

timeout.subject: Timeout -- %s
timeout.body:
Dear User,
Your submitted job timed out. More details are available at https://search.mmseqs.com/queue/%s .
Please adjust the job and submit it again.

error.subject: Error -- %s
error.body:
Dear User,
Your submitted job failed. More details are available at https://search.mmseqs.com/queue/%s .
Please submit your job later again.
